def_cn: （声音或言辞）甜蜜的，悦耳的;（尤指）虚伪的，阿谀的
def_en: You can describe some-one's voice or words as honeyed when they are very pleasant to listen to, especially if you want to suggest that they are insincere.
You can describe something as honeyed when it tastes or smells of honey, or is the pale yellowish colour of honey.
